import React from 'react' import '../../index.scss' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' export default function Register() { const [formData, setFormData] = React.useState({ fullname: "", email: "", username: "", password: "", }) console.log(formData); function handleChange(event) { setFormData(prevData => { return { ...prevData, [event.target.name]: event.target.value, } }) } return (
Register
) }
